channel.title: Notetakingapp on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Notetakingapp on Deuts Log

item.title: Many Notes
item.description:
Many Notes

Many Notes is a markdown note-taking app designed for simplicity! Easily create or import your vaults and organize your thoughts right away.

Vaults are simply storage containers for your files, and Many Notes provides you with the flexibility to keep everything in one vault or to separate your files into multiple vaults.

Just another one of those note-taking apps.
item.content:encoded:
Many Notes

Many Notes is a markdown note-taking app designed for simplicity! Easily create or import your vaults and organize your thoughts right away.

Vaults are simply storage containers for your files, and Many Notes provides you with the flexibility to keep everything in one vault or to separate your files into multiple vaults.

Just another one of those note-taking apps.

item.title: PhiTux/DailyTxT: Encrypted Diary Web-App
item.description:
PhiTux/DailyTxT: Encrypted Diary Web-App

Encrypted Diary Web-App. Contribute to PhiTux/DailyTxT development by creating an account on GitHub.
I don’t know, this might be an option for encrypted notes. I’m not just so sure about the encryption method.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: SilverBullet
item.description:
SilverBullet

IntroductionSilverBullet is a note-taking application optimized for people with a hacker mindset. We all take notes. There’s a million note taking applications out there. Literally. Wouldn’t it be nice to have one where your notes are more than plain tex
item.content:encoded:
SilverBullet

IntroductionSilverBullet is a note-taking application optimized for people with a hacker mindset. We all take notes. There’s a million note taking applications out there. Literally. Wouldn’t it be nice to have one where your notes are more than plain tex
